original_title: Jack Jimminy: The Story of a Pornstar Extra
overview: Jack Jimminy: The Story of a Pornstar Extra is a mockumentary following the life of Jack, the son of two of the greatest porn stars to ever grace the XXX screen. The only problem is that Jack is really an extra who goes to great lengths to hide the truth from his parents. This short explores Jack's family, social life, and a regular day on the job as a 'pornstar extra'.
title: Jack Jimminy: The Story of a Pornstar Extra
